original_text:
To fill his belly to the full,
    God will send his burning anger against him
    and rain it upon him into his body.
korean_text: 그가 배를 불리려 할 때에 하나님이 맹렬한 진노를 내리시리니 음식을 먹을 때에 그의 위에 비 같이 쏟으시리라

sentences.original_text: To fill his belly to the full
God will send his burning anger against him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그에게 뜨거운 진노를 보내실 것이며

sentences.original_text: rain it upon him into his body
